item.title: @elonmusk: Hundreds of millions of dollars from Minnesota have funded radical Islamic terror in Somalia. Itâ€™s s...
item.description: Hundreds of millions of dollars from Minnesota have funded radical Islamic terror in Somalia. Itâ€™s so bad that the MN taxpayer is the largest source of funds for the Somali terror group Al-Shabaab. Iâ€™ll be chairing a Senate Judiciary hearing to fight this fraud.

item.title: @elonmusk: Actual innocent women and mothers are killed every day in this country by lawless thugs with 20+ pri...
item.description: Actual innocent women and mothers are killed every day in this country by lawless thugs with 20+ prior arrests, still walking the streets because some woke judge has more compassion for violent animals than law abiding citizens. The people weeping over Renee Good never say a word about any of those victims. No candlelight vigils. No mass outrage. No protests. And weâ€™re supposed to take their grief seriously? As if these people are even capable of sincere human emotion at this point? Give me a break.

item.description: It is obviously fair and normal to ask for receipts before blindly wiring money or fraud will grow to infinity! The blue states are suing for one reason: to keep the fraud going.

item.title: @elonmusk: Suddenly the UK Government are cracking down on sexually abusive images...and have chosen to target ...
item.description: Suddenly the UK Government are cracking down on sexually abusive images...and have chosen to target X Not the myriad porn websites that disseminate billions of misogynistic, violent and paedophilic content Not Snapchat which is often used by creeps trying to groom kids No. The platform that has become the UK's number one news source. I am a vehement campaigner against pornification and for women's safety, but I'm frankly not buying this This is gaslighting and deception to create faux moral outrage while the mad Commies literally shut down free society and censor information

item.description: My grandparents on my motherâ€™s side were from England. They immigrated to Moose Jaw, Saskatchewan, Canada when they were 19 years old. I have relatives in England. It used to be lovely and safe. It is worth saving.
